Sections.Name: DynamicHorsePositioning
Sections.Description: Position horse dynamically with the camera's position.

Keys.Name: DynamicHorsePositioning
Keys.Description: Without this, the horse will just be positioned at the "center angle" you choose in Horse Position section.

Keys.Name: DynamicHorseJumping
Keys.Description: Move Horse upwards during apex of jump and down when on ground.

Sections.Name: CenterPositioning
Sections.Description: Horse's "center" position and camera angle where it will be set to that position.

Keys.Name: HorseCenterPosition
Keys.Description: Horse's position when at the "center" position. 0 = middle of screen.

Keys.Name: HorseCenterAngle
Keys.Description: Camera angle where horse will be positioned at it's "center" position. 0 = middle of screen.

Sections.Name: DownPositioning
Sections.Description: Horse's "down" position and camera angle where it will be set to that position.

Keys.Name: HorseDownPosition
Keys.Description: Horse's position when at the "down" position. 0 = middle of screen.

Keys.Name: HorseDownAngle
Keys.Description: Cameraangle where horse will be positioned at the "bottom" position. 90 = looking straight up

Keys.Name: HorseHorizontalPosition
Keys.Description: Horse's position horizontally. Moves horse left/right. 0 = center of screen.
